mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items(cart_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES(#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS unit_price, ci.quantity AS quantity, (p.price * ci.quantity) AS line_total FROM cart_items ci JOIN products p ON p.id = ci.product_id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId} ORDER BY p.id
